extendedInfo.description: Open the app, klick on âtime recordingâ, select the task you want to record - finished! Now with synchronization with web-based time tracking software FINARX Timesheet Cloud: http://www.timesheet.finarx.net/For the managing of time protocols, you can use the extensive functionality.âºâºApplicationsâââº Simplify the logging of your tasks and working hours- fast and direct time recording in only few steps- playback button for the express working time logging whereaboutâº Export of working times entries- as a PDF and CSV- storage on a SD card- e-mailingâºSettings- First and second, company name- Define a company for your report- Define a currency- Define reviews.title: Gut gelungen
reviews.comment: Ich finde die App insgesamt gut gelungen. Ich f\303\244nde es zus\303\244tzlich gut wenn es eine M\303\266glichkeit geben w\303\274rde die Pausenzeiten f\303\274r jede Arbeitszeit manuell anzulegen.
reviews.author: A Google User
